thread.title: NASA releases space-eye view of Hurricane Patricia from the ISS
thread.title_full: NASA releases space-eye view of Hurricane Patricia from the ISS - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: NASA releases space-eye view of Hurricane Patricia from the ISS
text: NASA has released video footage of Hurricane Patricia taken from the International Space Station, showing just how far the behemoth storm spreads throughout the Pacific. The video was taken today at 12:15PM ET, after the storm had been upgraded to a powerful Category 5 hurricane. Patricia is so massive that the storm seems to take up the entire frame of each shot, completely obscuring the Earth underneath and turning its surface into one big white swirl. It's hard to see exactly where the storm ends. Â»
